mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cp_user_tb WHERE use_stat = 1 AND user_id = 1

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN pt.point_rdate IS NOT NULL THEN ot.od_sell_price * 0.01 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN pt.point_stat = 0 THEN ot.od_sell_price * 0.01 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN pt.point_stat = 2 THEN pt.od_use_point ELSE 0 END) AS point_calu FROM point_tb pt JOIN od_tb ot ON pt.od_id = ot.od_id WHERE pt.user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_tb WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_grade FROM user_tb WHERE user_id = 1

SELECT ot.order_id, GROUP_CONCAT(odt.order_rdate) AS order_rdates, GROUP_CONCAT(odt.order_stts) AS order_sttss, GROUP_CONCAT(ot.prod_id) AS prod_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(pt.prod_tit) AS prod_tits, GROUP_CONCAT(ot.od_sell_price) AS od_sell_prices, GROUP_CONCAT(ot.od_cnt) AS od_cnts, GROUP_CONCAT(ot.od_stts) AS od_sttss FROM od_tb ot JOIN order_tb odt ON ot.order_id = odt.order_id JOIN prod_tb pt ON ot.prod_id = pt.prod_id WHERE ot.user_id = 1 GROUP BY ot.order_id
